abstract: Wheels column; advice provided on how to properly test drive a car as well as other issues related to value and affordability.
lead_paragraph: An auto journalist has advice for the rest of us: Ask for a lower price even if it seems rock bottom, and expect to be more stressed than you think.

headline.main: When the Car Reviewer Buys a Car
headline.print_headline: When the Test Drives End With an Offer, Not a Review

snippet: An auto journalist has advice for the rest of us: Ask for a lower price even if it seems rock bottom, and expect to be more stressed than you think.
